ability.Snow Warning: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Snow.
ability.Aurora Bless: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Aurora Veil, which halves both physical and special damage to the user for 3 turns.

Blizzard.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Snow, this move does not check accuracy.

Calm Mind.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Thunderbolt.effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

Rest.effect: The user falls asleep and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, or is already asleep.
